moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: On My Mark!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 2
passives.description: Charges the user’s move gauge by 2 the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Troublemaker 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of success for status moves that inflict status conditions.
